posts.post_content:
Posted By: Geoff Litwack
SGC authentic from the Nagy collection. It looks like it's been cut on a slant at the bottom; it certainly isn't a professional trim job. Otherwise, presents like a 6, with only a hairline scratch in the varnish on the front (you can see it in his cap in the scan) and slightly tilted registration toward the bottom. Gone to eBay, will be [URL="http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=110231433286"]up on Sunday night[/URL].

[IMG]http://litwack.org/auctions/chancef.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://litwack.org/auctions/chancer.jpg[/IMG]
